title: Is This Man *Too* Romantic? + DJ Willie T’s Weekly Wrap Rap
description:
Our Show Director Tommy, formerly of the rap group Def Force (true story) brings you what you missed this week, rap style. 
But first, is there such thing as a man doing too much, too soon? In this case, Moe's friend is questioning the man she's currently dating. Within their first four dates, he ordered a TON of different flowers.
She thinks it's romantic, but her family thinks otherwise. Plus, there's a list of odd things he's done since they started dating. Is there something off about this guy?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
